UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile with personal and financial information.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile, matches Firebase Auth UID.

role.description: The user's role in the application.

monthlyBaseSalary.description: The user's monthly base salary used to calculate hourly rates.

currency.description: The currency symbol for monetary values (e.g., FCFA).

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

TimeEntry.title: TimeEntry
TimeEntry.description: Represents a single time entry record.

id.description: Unique identifier for the time entry.

startTime.description: The start time of the time entry.

endTime.description: The end time of the time entry.

location.description: Geolocation data associated with the time entry.

notes.description: Optional notes associated with the time entry.

Team.title: Team
Team.description: Represents a team of users for data sharing and summarization.

memberIds.description: References to UserProfiles. (Relationship: Team N:N UserProfile)

definition.description: Stores user profile information. The document ID is the user's UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user, corresponding to their Firebase Auth UID.

definition.description: Stores time entry records for each user.

params.name: userId

params.name: timeEntryId
params.description: The unique identifier for the time entry.

definition.description: Stores team information. The 'memberIds' array contains a list of user IDs.

params.name: teamId
